text: Armageddon (2006) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on December 17, 2006 at the Richmond Coliseum in Richmond, Virginia. It was the seventh Armageddon event held by WWE. The pay-per-view was a SmackDown! brand exclusive. The main event was a tag team match, which saw the team of Batista and John Cena defeat the team of King Booker and Finlay. Two other matches on the undercard, saw The Undertaker defeat Mr. Kennedy in a Last Ride match, and Kane defeat Montel Vontavious Porter in an Inferno match. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Vladimir Kozlov defeated Scotty 2 Hotty Singles match N/A 2 Kane defeated Montel Vontavious Porter Inferno match 8:14 3 Paul London and Brian Kendrick (c) defeated William Regal and Dave Taylor, MNM (Joey Mercury and Johnny Nitro), and The Hardys (Matt and Jeff Hardy) Four-way ladder match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 20:13 4 The Boogeyman defeated The Miz Singles match 2:51 5 Chris Benoit (c) defeated Chavo Guerrero (with Vickie Guerrero) by submission Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 12:14 6 Gregory Helms (c) defeated Jimmy Wang Yang Singles match for the WWE Cruiserweight Championship 10:51 7 The Undertaker defeated Mr. Kennedy Last Ride match 19:08 8 Batista and John Cena defeated King Booker's Court (Sir Finlay and King Booker) (with Queen Sharmell) Tag team match 11:29 (c) – is the champion(s) going into the match D – This match was a dark match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Armageddon 2006 website Category:2006 in professional wrestling Category:Richmond, Virginia Category:WWE Armageddon Category:2006 in American television Category:2000s in Virginia
title: Armageddon (2006)
